title: Nespresso VertuoLine: How To - Make A Latte Gourmand
description:
Nespresso is once again revolutionizing the world of coffee by launching the new VertuoLine system, which produces freshly brewed Coffee and authentic Espresso, with a rich and generous crema.

Get creative and enjoy a variation on a classic Italian Latte Macchiato, the Gourmand adds hot milk to your favorite VertuoLine Coffee while topping with creamy foam for a delightful and tasty treat

asset.author: Nespresso
asset.hookText:
